answers.answer: Hi, metabolic disorders like Diabetes Mellitus and Hypothyroidism could cause the symptoms described by you. A simple blood test could help detect diabetes and hypothyroidism. Also, inflammatory muscle disorders can cause the symptoms described by you, these are diagnosed by muscle biopsy. Consult your primary care physician for these tests. Regards.
